# dataFailed

**Type Property**

A notification the system posts when a sample buffer fails to load its data.

## Declaration

```swift
static let dataFailed: NSNotification.Name
```

## Notifications

- **dataBecameReady**: A notification the system posts when a sample buffer’s data becomes ready.
